project_descr: Combating Sexual and Gender Based Violence

outputs.output_descr: The aim of the project is to strengthen the capacity of the Gender Equality Directorate (GED) in the Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs in developing and introducing systematic solutions to address SGBV – such as development of the National Strategy for Combating SGBV; developing standard procedures and proceedings for relevant services for victims; development of a coherent data gathering system on SGBV. The project will support the GED to work on development of curricula on SGBV for civil servants and start with implementation of training cycles in relevant institutions. The project will
